subject: [Good] Airbnb: Right to leave the service
text:
»You may cancel your Airbnb Account at any time via the “Cancel
Account” feature of the Services or by sending an email to
terms@airbnb.com.«

Which is good. I’d also say that the following is ok:

»Please note that if your Airbnb Account is cancelled, we do not have
an obligation to delete or return to you any Content you have posted
to the Site, Application and Services, including, but not limited to,
any reviews or Feedback.«

Considering that it’s public reviews of places and other users I’d say
this is reasonable. I wonder though if your name will still show up
there, or if it will say something like »(deleted user)« similar to
reddit for instance.


(From https://www.airbnb.com/terms, section »Termination and Airbnb
Account Cancellation«)
